title: When people complain about damage being high, this is what they mean
body:
https://clips.twitch.tv/MagnificentScrumptiousBubbleteaBudStar

all caps had for damage was {{item:1056}} {{item:1052}} {{item:3057}} but he was still able to completely delete leblanc in under a second with essentially zero counterplay. 

This is a problem.

replies.body: He wd which is empowered basic and Ed charged flashed and ulted and thunderlords what's the complaint
clip doesnt seem to work
fixed. I guess the "share clip" button doesn't work? lol
Just saw, holy crap thats bs

I genuinely want to see anyone try to defend this. There isn't even an item or level advantage because they're both at level 7 and it's only 8 min into the game. 

I get that Gragas used his whole combo, but just because someone rolls their face on their keyboard doesn't mean they should get a free kill.

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=70L2HraA,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2019-07-23T03:13:46.552+0000)
>
> I genuinely want to see anyone try to defend this. There isn't even an item or level advantage because they're both at level 7 and it's only 8 min into the game. 
> 
> I get that Gragas used his whole combo, but just because someone rolls their face on their keyboard doesn't mean they should get a free kill.


We're just gonna ignore the fact he had to burn flash to get that combo off and the fact his Q doesn't deal max damage till charged, giving players time to prepare?

Before you even say "But leblanc was cc'ed" there was nothing stopping leblanc from respecting his E-Flash when the Q came out by simply walking back, OR flashing the second Caps used his Dash.

This is 2019, not 2013 where players are too dumb to punish you for disrespecting their kill threat.

Btw, this exact gragas combo has been a thing since at least **season 6 ** , better complain about it now cause it fits your narrative though /s

There is nothing about a full-HP one shot combo at level 7, with essentially 0 items, that is acceptable. 

but ok, sure. 

>Btw, this exact gragas combo has been a thing since at least season 6 , better complain about it now cause it fits your narrative though /s

this clip didn't exist in season 6

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=70L2HraA,comment-id=000000010000000000010000,timestamp=2019-07-23T03:55:14.747+0000)
>
> There is nothing about a full-HP 

Clip shows leblanc at 80% hp, but i guess being blind is also a must when you're making post like these.

>this clip didn't exist in season 6


And that changes this combo doing the exact same damage how? 

https://youtu.be/vBrmaXsZxX0?t=43s

>Clip shows leblanc at 80% hp, but i guess being blind is also a must when you're making post like these.

I recreated the circumstances in a practice game against a target dummy and was able to deal 974 damage magic damage. That's post mitigation. Practice dummies have 100 MR and leblanc appears to have ~1200 max HP in the video so it's not a stretch to say "full-hp" 

EDIT: and that's not counting ignite

Stop being pedantic. 

There is no reason for a champion at level 7 to be able to deal 1k damage almost instantaneously. 

"Why didn't you complain about [thing] back then?"

1. Are you assuming I didn't? 

2. How is this stopping me from complaining about it now? 

3. Why *can't* I complain about it now?
It's easy he dashed e wd empowered basic ulted and thunderlords what's the complaint? Against some one who has no Mr

lmao we got one

edit: we got a second one
What are you complaining about? Not understanding

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=70L2HraA,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2019-07-23T03:13:46.552+0000)
>
> I genuinely want to see anyone try to defend this. There isn't even an item or level advantage because they're both at level 7 and it's only 8 min into the game. 
> 
> I get that Gragas used his whole combo, but just because someone rolls their face on their keyboard doesn't mean they should get a free kill.

He used his whole combo but not all of it hit.

0. Cast Q which didn't hit
0. Cast W to get the empowered auto ready
0. Cast E and Flashed on top of LB near the end of it
0. Cast R
0. Autoattack

So LB got hit by E, R, W (auto), then Electrocute, losing 85% of her health within about 2/3rds of the E stun (1 second). With a Doran's Ring, Amp Tome, and Sheen.

> [{quoted}](name=Tr4shB4NSYST3M,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=70L2HraA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-07-23T02:24:47.349+0000)
>
> clip doesnt seem to work

Looks like a link to the stream itself rather than an archived stream.
In before "LeBlanc is made of dust, this proves nothing." If someone makes that argument, I get free blue essence.
Yeah. It also only took every ability, summoner spell, and rune/item proc he had to pull it off.

And? This is a LEVEL 7 gragas dealing ~1k damage almost instantaneously and with essentially 0 skill input. That is NOT OK. This is not a level 16, almost full build zed landing a triple Q. This is not ok.

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=70L2HraA,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2019-07-23T04:53:02.958+0000)
>
> And? This is a LEVEL 7 gragas dealing ~1k damage almost instantaneously and with essentially 0 skill input. That is NOT OK. This is not a level 16, almost full build zed landing a triple Q. This is not ok.

Caps seems to think it's okay. He looked pretty proud with the combo he was able to land. 

I don't see why there is upset about a pro player doing what he does best, making plays, showing off skills, performing predetermined combos. 

And for damage, it's the same thing everyone season. Some kid on Youtube, gets one shotted, some kid posts that to Reddit and the boards, "Ahh! Damage is too high! Oh the humanity!"

It's the same thing everyone season, damage is too high, and at what point was damage ever at a 'balanced' point if all anyone does is post about how damage was too high from seasons 1 onward.

You know what happens next? Some kid says, "Tank meta!" and we come full circle. Like the topic on damage being broadly described as 'too high' is riding on the edge of not being a pertinent topic worthy of boards discussion due to the complex nature of season balance changes, the-same-as-it-ever-was posts, and a rally of rage posts.

>Caps seems to think it's okay. He looked pretty proud with the combo he was able to land.

yeah and I bet the leblanc was fucking livid that she just got deleted from the map with 0 warning. 

>I don't see why there is upset about a pro player doing what he does best, making plays, showing off skills, performing predetermined combos.

no offense to caps or anything but it doesn't take any skill at all to e-flash W, ignite, and R them in the general direction of your Q. It's literally button mashing and I did it correctly first try in a practice match. 

>It's the same thing everyone season, damage is too high, and at what point was damage ever at a 'balanced' point if all anyone does is post about how damage was too high from seasons 1 onward.

maybe it's because the problem slowly getting worse...? Watch old replays and highlights, TTK is WAY higher than it is now. 

>You know what happens next? Some kid says, "Tank meta!" and we come full circle. Like the topic on damage being broadly described as 'too high' is riding on the edge of not being a pertinent topic worthy of boards discussion due to the complex nature of season balance changes, the-same-as-it-ever-was posts, and a rally of rage posts.

wow ur literally so cool for being such a contrarian.

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=70L2HraA,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2019-07-23T05:04:49.709+0000)
>
> yeah and I bet the leblanc was fucking livid that she just got deleted from the map with 0 warning. 
> 
> no offense to caps or anything but it doesn't take any skill at all to e-flash W, ignite, and R them in the general direction of your Q. It's literally button mashing and I did it correctly first try in a practice match. 
> 
> maybe it's because the problem slowly getting worse...? Watch old replays and highlights, TTK is WAY higher than it is now. 
> 
> wow ur literally so cool for being such a contrarian.

First of all, you didn't need to go on the offensive. I'm just stating a fact of what has happened in past seasons regarding this topic. You cannot deny, as an frequent boards poster yourself, that this is a topic that gets mentioned every season and rarely generates any positive or constructive discussion. 

High ranked games, all games, are win or lose. Every opportunity you can find to get an edge on your opponent is crucial to winning. Caps saw a window and played the situation he and Leblanc put themselves in and he came our the winner in that scenario. Whether you agree with it or not, in high ranked matches, in these outcomes, there is no time to pout over X being what it is. The best anyone can do is pick yourself up and do better. Honestly, what's to say about the Leblanc players character if their jerk reaction to Caps play was to just rage. 

I also don't follow what you mean by TTK. Google can't provide me with the context you're using it in.

Finally I don't see 'damage being high' as a problem but more as an excuse anyone will put onto the boards to garner attention. That's just my opinion. And like anyone who strong stands by their opinion of damage being too much of a problem because its broadly describe as 'high. Then I take the same stance on my opinion that it isn't. 

But you know. Contrarian. I dig it. But don't waste all your wit on me dude. I'm just as much as nuisance to you as you are to me. 

GL HF on your next game that has **Too high damage â„¢**

>High ranked games, all games, are win or lose. Every opportunity you can find to get an edge on your opponent is crucial to winning. Caps saw a window and played the situation he and Leblanc put themselves in and he came our the winner in that scenario. Whether you agree with it or not, in high ranked matches, in these outcomes, there is no time to pout over X being what it is. The best anyone can do is pick yourself up and do better. Honestly, what's to say about the Leblanc players character if their jerk reaction to Caps play was to just rage.

"low time to kill (TTK, sorry it's a lesser-known term) doesn't matter because 'git gud'" 

The point isn't that high damage is making the game unbalanced or something. It's that it feels like shit to play a game where you get insta-deleted by champions at level 7 with basically 0 items.
AP fat man is not to be trifled with.

how is he too tanky with only lichbane?
dat damage
He flashed had thunderlords and ulted and wd what's ur point?
